episodes.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episodes.description: Today: identifying your chance to speak at a meeting. Timothy James Mahrt, from the United States, works at an IT firm in Tokyo. He has difficulty finding the right time to speak up.
episodes.subtitle: #22 Identifying your chance to speak at a meeting
episodes.title: Easy Japanese for Work

episodes.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episodes.description: Today: adjusting a schedule with a client. Lan Cheng, from China, works in Gunma Prefecture at a company that makes pizza ovens. He'd like to learn how to better communicate with customers.
episodes.subtitle: #24 Adjusting a schedule with a client
episodes.title: Easy Japanese for Work

episodes.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episodes.description: Today: making small talk with a client. Raphael Marso, from Germany, works at a company that makes manufacturing equipment. He takes on a roleplay challenge to help improve his Japanese skills.
episodes.subtitle: #25 Making small talk with a client
episodes.title: Easy Japanese for Work

episodes.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episodes.description: Today: cheering up a junior employee who is feeling down. Nyamjav Baljinnyam, from Mongolia, works at a car maintenance company. He takes on a roleplay challenge to help improve his Japanese skills.
episodes.subtitle: #26 Cheering up a junior employee who is feeling down
episodes.title: Easy Japanese for Work

episodes.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episodes.description: Today: asking others for favors. Warni Letty Yuhara, from Indonesia, works at a farm in Ibaraki Prefecture. She struggles with others to stay late. To improve, she tackles a roleplay challenge.
episodes.subtitle: #27 Asking others for favors
episodes.title: Easy Japanese for Work

episodes.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episodes.description: Today: checking that others have understood instructions. Shang Yan, from China, works as a train cleaner in Tokyo. To improve her skills as a team leader, she tackles a roleplay challenge.
episodes.subtitle: #28 Checking that others have understood instructions
episodes.title: Easy Japanese for Work

episodes.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episodes.description: Today: reporting to a superior that a coworker is ill. Tran Dinh Thang works at a construction firm in Kanagawa. In a roleplay challenge, he must report to a superior that a coworker has become ill.
episodes.subtitle: #29 Reporting to a superior that a coworker is ill
episodes.title: Easy Japanese for Work

episodes.content: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
episodes.description: Today: turning down a request for support politely. Wang Chihsun is a pastry chef at an American restaurant in Tokyo. In a roleplay challenge, he must turn down a busy coworker's request for help.
episodes.subtitle: #30 Turning down a request for support politely
episodes.title: Easy Japanese for Work
